text: Nelson Henry, one of many Black soldiers who were given discriminatory “blue discharges” during World War II, fought to correct the slight and ultimately won. He died of the coronavirus. https://t.co/VawNfbMrce

name: nytimes
text: After a party with up to 100 people in Rockland County, New York, the party host and 8 guests tested positive for the coronavirus. But those contacted by disease tracers trying to learn who else might have been exposed won’t talk. Now they face subpoenas. https://t.co/C79MxRTt4c
